thread.title: Here’s Video Proof College Students Think All Professors Should Be Anti-Trump [VIDEO]
thread.title_full: Here’s Video Proof College Students Think All Professors Should Be Anti-Trump [VIDEO]

author: Rob Shimshock
title: Here’s Video Proof College Students Think All Professors Should Be Anti-Trump [VIDEO]
text:
TOP 5564844 
Nearly all students at one college signed a petition prohibiting the employment of pro-Trump professors when asked to do so in a video released Thursday. 
Campus Reform contributor Cabot Phillips visited American University in Washington, D.C., to get signatures for a petition that would prevent the university from hiring professors who supported President Donald Trump. 
One faculty member even signed the petition. 
WATCH: 
Out of the more than 20 university members Phillips asked to sign the petition, only one refused.
